text: The water polo Competitions at the 2014 Central American and Caribbean Games took place at the Leyes de Reforma Aquatics Centre in Veracruz, Mexico from November 22 to 29.Water polo schedule There were two competitions, one each for men and women, seven national teams competed in the men's tournament, while five contested the women's event. The top 3 teams (affiliated to the Central American and Caribbean Swimming Federation) in each tournament qualifies to compete at the 2015 Pan American Games in Toronto, Canada.Water polo technical
